game.name: PAYDAY 2: Armored Transport
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Armored Transport DLC is the second DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do every heisters dream – robbing armored transports, full of valuables, right in the middle of Washington D.C. If they're lucky, they can hit it big with a classic train robbery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Armored Transport DLC is the second DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do every heisters dream – robbing armored transports, full of valuables, right in the middle of Washington D.C. If they're lucky, they can hit it big with a classic train robbery.
